text:
The search API (`POST /crm/v3/lists/search`) includes an option `additionalProperties`  that can be queried about the lists, but I can't find what properties are available.  I'm essentially trying to inventory all of our lists and their current settings, and I'd like to include any extra properties that are available.

Related to this, why does the `GET /crm/v3/lists/{listId}` not support the same option?  It doesn't seem to return any of the example properties by default (e.g. `hs_is_public` ).
